title: (x) Herman Miller logo - FF Meta {Patricia}
content:
I am trying to identify the Herman Miller logo font...   
   
 ![Herman Miller Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203184633im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/49105.gif)   
   
Any help is greatly appreciated. Thanks!
author: mike2325

comments.content: Meta Plus Medium seems pretty close. Thanks!
It actually surprises me that Herman Miller would use a font rather than a custom designed logo since he's so much about design, but looking at the web site it definitely looks like Meta to me.

After I read your post, Patricia, I did a little digging. Herman Miller hasn't been a "he" since the 1920s. And even then, Mr. Miller was just the titular head.   
   
(You learn darnedest things on the Internet!)   
   
 [http://www.hermanmiller.com/CDA/SSA/Timeline/0,1589,a10-c364-tl3,00.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203184633/http:/www.hermanmiller.com/CDA/SSA/Timeline/0%2C1589%2Ca10-c364-tl3%2C00.html)
Well I didn't mean Herman Miller the person as much as Herman Miller the company. I assume he's long dead. But I'd have thought they'd have a more original logo given they're a design company.
I figured you knew. But the image of a 150-year-old man at the helm of a relatively cool furniture manufacturer amused me.
